name: TriBound
description:
Tribound is a fast paced platformer with balls to touch and
four-sided enemies to shoot up. Try to be as fast as you can in navigating multiple unique levels while being careful where you jump so you don't end up dead rather than victorious.

__________________________________________________

Game is made in the Godot engine.

Please report any bugs or issues you might find as well as if the MacOS build works since it's untested.

__________________________________________________ Version 1.1

-fixed a bug where trail length was dependent on fps
